#summary List of all keyboard shortcuts

||C-x||The control key based shortcuts are used for frequently used editing commands.||
||A-x||The alternate key is used for commands which depend on the mode that you are in.||
||M-x||The meta key is used for general purpose texmacs commands, which can be used in all modes.||
||H-x||The hyper key is used for producing special symbols like Greek characters in math mode.||
